UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile with personalized information for the Synapse Pakistan AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

language.description: User's preferred language (e.g., English, Urdu, Roman Urdu).

interests.description: User's interests, stored as an array of strings.

lastInteraction.description: Date and time of the user's last interaction with the AI.

memoryNotes.description: Additional notes about the user's preferences, goals, or past queries.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores individual user profiles. The document ID is the user's Firebase Auth UID, ensuring only the authenticated user can access their own profile.
